pages.text: $(item)Carbon fiber$() is a lightweigth, highly resistant and easily shaped material.$(br2)It's fairly complex to produce with staged crafting recipes, hence it's mostly used for superior $(l:0_basics/warp_armor)Space suits$() and machines.

pages.title: Raw carbon fiber
pages.text: Easy to produce, once you get the blaze.

pages.title: Raw carbon mesh
pages.text: $(l:0_basics/biofiber)Biofiber$() sheets are used to protect and hold the mesh together, giving Carbon fiber its high durability.

pages.title: Carbon fiber
pages.text: Smelting $(item)Raw carbon mesh$() binds the materials together, giving it its final shape to $(item)Carbon fiber$().
